Details</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="IsTechnical" type="boolean" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>1 .. technical error, 0 .. business error</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="Repeatable" type="boolean" minOccurs="0"> <annotation> <documentation>1 .. execution repeatable, 0 .. non-repeatable</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="CC" type="token"> <annotation> <documentation>Country Code</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="NDC" type="token"> <annotation> <documentation>National Destination Code</documentation> </annotation> </element> <element name="SN" type="token"> <annotation> <documentation>Subscriber Number</documentation> </annotation> </element> </sequence> </complexType> base="string"> <enumeration value="EUR"/> <enumeration value="PERCENT"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="PeriodType"> <restriction base="string"> <enumeration value="monthly"/> value="required"/> <enumeration value="optional"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="Quantity"> <sequence> <element name="Units" type="string"/> <element name="Amount" type="decimal"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="TimePeriod"> <sequence> <element name="StartDateTime" type="dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> <element name="EndDateTime" type="dateTime" minOccurs="0"/> value="dateTime"/> <enumeration value="decimal"/> <enumeration value="lkmsId"/> <enumeration value="mbit"/> <enumeration value="mb"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <simpleType name="sidId"> base="ns0:BillingArrangement"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="BEN" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="Address"> </xs:annotation> <xs:simpleType> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:maxLength value="12"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="Street" minOccurs="0"> <xs:annotation> the Contact.
